plugins.name: Pinwheel Plugin
plugins.description:
Import Design Tokens JSON to Figma variables and Figma styles. Export Figma variables and styles to Design Tokens JSON. Use mode names to create groups for light mode, dark mode, and high contrast variants. Full support for importing and exporting sRGB and Display P3, allowing colors to maintain correct appearance when being moved from Figma to Pinwheel.


It’s a great way to transfer colors, numbers, strings, shadows, and booleans to and from Figma to Pinwheel, or anywhere that can import Design Tokens Community Group formatted JSON.


What's Pinwheel? We’re glad you asked. It’s an amazing app for managing your design system, converting between color formats and color spaces, and automating color contrast testing. If you work with design systems, Pinwheel is for you.

plugins.name: AppStore Screenshot Icon Hunter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for automatically retrieving and laying out App Store app screenshots.


Key Features

•Support searching for apps by name or App ID

•Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots

•Support multiple data sources (App Store API, iTunes Search API)

•Automatically create beautiful layouts

•Display download progress in real time

•Support customizing icon sizes and spacing


Usage

1.Install the plugin in Figma

2.Search for the app by name or App ID

3.Select the target app

4.Configure layout parameters (optional)

5.Click the “Collect & Package” button

6.Wait for screenshot download and layout completion

plugins.name: exportLang.json
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin, named exportLang, streamlines the process of extracting static texts from Figma designs and generating variable names for these texts through ChatGPT. The workflow is as follows:


Data Retrieval:


The plugin reads a JSON file, exportLang.json, where users store static texts from their Figma designs.

Variable Name Assignment:


For each static text in the JSON file, the plugin generates a unique variable name. For example, if there are three texts, the variable names might be text1, text2, and text3.

ChatGPT Interaction:


Using the generated variable names and their corresponding static texts, the plugin communicates with ChatGPT. It sends prompts to ChatGPT, requesting translation of the static texts into variable names.

Response Handling:


The plugin receives responses from ChatGPT, containing suggested variable names. These responses are associated with the original static texts.

Output in JSON Format:


The final output is a JSON file containing a mapping between variable names and their respective static texts. This structured JSON output facilitates easy integration into users' Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: exportLang.json

plugins.name: design-tokens.io Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
This is the Figma plugin for design-tokens.io


design-tokens.io is the real-time hub for your Design Tokens.


Ensure design consistency across multiple brands, themes and projects.

Accelerate release cycles through seamless handoffs between designers and developers.

Built for agencies and enterprise design teams.


Consistency across all brands

Keep a single source of truth for all your Design Tokens. All your themes stay 100% interchangable, by default.


Seamless import & export

Import and export your Design Tokens as W3C-compliant JSON. Avoid vendor lock-in.


Real-time collaboration

Multiple users manage Design Tokens, themes and brands at the same time. No workflow bottlenecks, no data conflicts.


Bridge design and development

Designers sync their Design Tokens with Figma variables in real-time. Developers receive CSS/SASS variables. No manual handoffs necessary.



FAQs


What if I already use Figma Variables?

That’s fine! Our platform natively supports Figma Variables while protecting you from their limited scalability and interoperability. It acts as a single-source-of-truth for all your Design Tokens and integrates with all your tools, not just Figma.


I only use the free Figma plan. Will this work for me?

Yes! Our Figma plugin works with every Figma plan, even the free one. It lets you import your Design Tokens into Figma and sync your changes in real-time, no matter how many tokens, themes and brands you manage.


Why not use Tokens Studio?

Tokens Studio is great, but it is primarily a Figma plugin - intended to be used by Figma users from within Figma. It even stores all your Design Tokens inside Figma.

Our platform takes the opposite approach: It is a standalone, single-purpose data hub that lets your whole team collaborate on your Design Tokens and syncs them to all your tools, not just Figma.


We're already using Supernova. Is this compatible?

Absolutely! You can start using our platform in tandem with Supernova today, since Supernova will import your Design Tokens from Figma as usual. We're also working on a native Supernova hook that will make the process even more seamless!


Is the platform W3C-compliant?

Yes! Our platform ensures maximum interoperability with all your other tools by being fully compliant with the latest version of the W3C Design Tokens specification. You can seamlessly import and export Design Tokens as W3C DTCG JSON.


What's the learning curve for my team?

Our platform is reportedly much easier to use than comparable tools and was designed from the ground up to make managing and accessing Design Tokens as simple as possible.

You will be up and running in a matter of minutes. Watch demo
plugins.tagline: Auto-sync your Design Tokens from design-tokens.io to Figma

plugins.name: Layout Switch
plugins.description:
Layout Switch will help you save 95% of your time in switching your UI layouts from LTR layout to RTL or vise versa! Select how many frames you want and choose your destination layout and click on the button. BOOOOM! all the layouts are changed!

Layout Switch is your ultimate Figma plugin for effortlessly converting designs between left-to-right (LTR) and right-to-left (RTL) layouts. Whether you're adapting English designs for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flipping RTL layouts back to LTR, this plugin makes the process fast, precise, and hassle-free. With support for multiple frames at once, Layout Switch is the perfect tool for designers working on global projects.


🖼️ Multi-Frame Support:

Select a single frame or a bunch of frames at once! The plugin handles multiple selections effortlessly, making it perfect for large projects with numerous screens or components.


✨ Blazing Fast Conversion:

Transform your designs in seconds—no more wasting time on manual tweaks. Whether you're converting LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, it’s as fast as a blink!


🛠️ Easy to Use:

No complex settings or learning curves. Just select your frames, choose your direction (LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR), click "Convert," and watch the magic happen. We also have two side-plugins that run directly!


🌍 Bidirectional Flexibility:

Works seamlessly in both directions—convert LTR to RTL for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flip RTL layouts back to LTR for English or other left-writing languages.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


How It Works:

1.Select Frames: Choose one or multiple frames in your Figma project.

2.Choose Direction: Select whether you want to convert LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR.

3.Click on Change Direction: Run the plugin and let it flip your designs instantly.

4.Review & Polish: Enjoy perfectly adapted layouts, ready for further refinement or delivery.


Note: You save at least 95% your time changing layouts by using Layout Switch. Put your 5% effort on little handy modification😉

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Why Choose Layout Switch?

•Save Time: What used to take hours or days now takes seconds.

•Boost Productivity: Focus on creativity, not manual adjustments.

•Global Reach: Effortlessly design for both LTR and RTL languages, including Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, and more.

•Bidirectional Power: The only plugin you’ll need for flipping designs in both directions.



Perfect For:

•Designers working on multilingual or global projects.

•Teams adapting designs for Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, English, or other bidirectional languages.

•Anyone looking to streamline their Figma workflow and save time.



Get Started Now!

Stop struggling with manual conversions. Layout Switch is here to make your design process faster, smarter, and more efficient. Whether you're flipping LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, this plugin has you covered. Try it today and see the difference!



Support the Plugin

❤️ Love Layout Switch?

If this plugin has made your design process easier, consider supporting its development with a small donation. Your contribution helps keep the plugin updated and free for everyone!

👉 https://ko-fi.com/sabnouri


Have Questions or Suggestions?


We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback, suggestions for new features, or just need help, feel free to reach out.

📧 Contact Us: sabernooriusb@gmail.com

🌐 Check my website at: https://designbysab.webflow.io
plugins.tagline: LTR or RTL? Switch in a flash—best for Arabic, Persian, and beyond! Convert 1000 frames at a run!

plugins.name: SVGReactify - SVG Component Creator
plugins.description:
Figma plugin that allows you to generate single/multiple SVG React & React Native components at once. Prepared as .eslint friendly and support parent color schemas with fill/stroke optimize


Features

  • Generate multiple components at once
  • Save each one or all as files
  • Expand props version
  • Typescript
  • With dimension or without dimensions (for responsive)
  • Icon
  • React Native
  • Ref
  • Memo
  • Prettier
  • Xmlns / Non-xmlns


To use SVGReactify

  1. Run the "SVGReactify - SVG Component Creator" plugin
  2. Highlight icon(s) in your Figma project
  3. Choose the settings of code you want to on left side.
  4. If you hightlight multiple items on project, you will see "Selected Icons" list. Choose one.
  5. Copy with top right side button of code preview icon for only 1 item.
  6. Or export all selected icon(s) as zip file


License

After 3 all days tried full functions, you'll be asked to enter your license key. Your license key will allow you or your team unlimited usage of SVGReactify.


To purchase a license for you or your team, please visit https://gurayyarar.gumroad.com/l/svg-reactify (Gumroad)

plugins.name: Chart Cleaner
plugins.description:
Drop your newly exported chart out of RAWGraphs and into Figma, then select it and run the plugin. Voila. Chart Cleaner duplicates the frame, cleans all the layers up, reorganizes everything, and then drops the new chart and legend (if you had one) into a new auto layout, ready for you to add your own copy and styles to. Everything remains editable as you'd normally expect.


Currently supports RAWGraphs SVGs, with Flourish coming soon. Currently cleans bar charts, small multiple bar charts, line graphs, and small multiple line graphs, with more coming soon.


Feedback more than welcome!
plugins.tagline: Quickly cleanup SVG charts, exported directly from RAWGraphs

plugins.name: Asterisk
plugins.description:
Annotate your designs with Asterisk!


Creating annotations

  1. Annotate to the left, right, above or below a target
  2. Add an optional header
  3. Add optional notes (Shift+Enter to add multiple lines)
  4. Add smaller secondary notes and an optional URL
  5. Customize the spacing between an annotation and its target
  6. Choose the color of an annotation


Global controls

  1. Show/hide all annotations on a page
  2. Lock/unlock all annotations on a page
  3. Delete all annotations on a page
  4. Refresh annotation locations (useful if a component instance inherits changes and moves)


Quality of life features

  1. Annotations follow their targets*
  2. Move an existing annotation to a new target
  3. Change any property of a selected annotation even after it was created
  4. Press Enter after typing in an input to quickly create an annotation
  5. Collapse the UI so you can keep it open but out of the way
  6. Double click any color in the UI to change Asterisk's theme!
  7. Dark mode support


Annotation tuning

  1. Customize annotation max width
  2. Change text size
  3. Show / hide author names on annotations
  4. Apply your tunings to all annotations on a page at once


* Asterisk must be open for annotations to follow their targets
plugins.tagline: Annotations everyone can see

plugins.name: PixelCast: Create aesthetic design timelpases
plugins.description:
PixelCast: Your Fast, Simple Tool for Figma Timelapses

  1. 🎨 Craft Timelapses in 3 Clicks – Perfect for your social media, portfolio, or website
  2. 🎬 One-Click Export – Save and share as video in an instant
  3. 📣 Showcase Your Design Process – Let the world see the journey, not just the result


Static is Boring. Show the Process.

Design isn’t just about the finished product; it’s about every stroke, nudge, and tweak along the way. PixelCast lets you capture each creative choice, each imperfect draft, and every ‘aha’ moment that brings it all together.


A screenshot is worth a 1000 words. A timelapse is worth a 1000 moments. 

We love a good screenshot too, but the real story? That’s in the details—the imperfect ellipses, the text with the font-spacing slightly off, and all the iterations in between. PixelCast lets you share your true design workflow.


How to use the plugin:


  1. Pick a Frame in Figma and click “Start Recording.”
  2. Design Away! Tweak, adjust, polish, and when you’re done, hit “Stop Recording.”
  3. Download Your Timelapse Video ✨


Features


Pixel-Perfect Export

Your timelapse videos look exactly like they do in Figma—click to export, and you’re good to go!


Super Lightweight 

PixelCast videos are optimized for easy sharing on social media with ultra-light file sizes.


Smart Capture 

PixelCast only records changes, so you can take your time to think without filling up frames.


Contact


Got feedback or found a bug? Email us at emailforyash@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Beautiful, shareable timelapse videos straight from Figma

plugins.name: Summary Sprint
plugins.description:
Summary Sprint is a user-friendly FigJam plugin designed to streamline your sprint planning and tracking—all within your favorite collaborative space. Instantly generate a clear overview of planned, completed, and unfinished tasks, visualized as color-coded cards for quick understanding. Choose the estimation method that best fits your team, from Fibonacci points to hours or any numeric values, ensuring a perfect match for your workflow.


How it Works:


Set Up Your Board:

  1. Add sticky notes (STICKY) with tasks and assign effort values.
  2. Group tasks and place them inside a Section.


Run the Plugin:

  1. Generate the Summary Sprint to view your sprint progress in real-time.
  2. Planned, done, and incomplete tasks are presented in distinct color-coded cards.


Track and Iterate:

  1. Review unplanned work and incomplete tasks to improve future sprints.
  2. Add neutral Notes cards for ideas, dependencies, or clarifications without affecting metrics.


Want to learn more?

Check out our Playground for a deeper explanation and additional tips. With Summary Sprint, you can effortlessly plan, visualize, and refine your sprints directly in FigJam.


Made with ❤️ in Poland.
plugins.tagline: Plan, estimate, and track sprints, visualize progress, reduce overhead, all inside FigJam right now!

plugins.name: Fonspector
plugins.description:
📝 Overview

Struggling to keep your typography consistent across frames without a design system in place? Fonspector makes it easy. This Figma plugin analyzes your project’s typography, offering instant insights to streamline your workflow. From refining a single frame to auditing an entire design system, Fonspector ensures consistency, identifies missing fonts and styles, and lets you navigate text elements effortlessly—all within your Figma workspace.


👉 Key Features

1. Comprehensive Frame Scanning

2. Multi-Font & Style Management

3. Detect Hidden Layers

4. Navigate to Text Elements


😤 How to Use

1. Select a Frame

2. Launch the Plugin

3. Initiate the Analysis by clicking the “Inspect” button

4. Explore Font Families

5. Navigate to Text Elements


📧 Support and Feedback

I'm excited to share Fonspector with the community as my first-ever plugin developed from scratch! Your feedback is invaluable for improving it. If you run into any issues, have suggestions, or need help, please reach out to me via email or leave a comment.

accepted.name: Harshil Patel
accepted.description: iOS Engineer turned Product Designer, passionate about Design.

plugins.tagline: Fonspector: Bringing Typography Consistency to Every Frame.

plugins.name: LinguaSync
plugins.description:
LinguaSync is in Beta test for limted user.


Features

  1. Context-Aware Translation: By leveraging the strengths of the AI model, which excels at understanding context, this plugin can accurately translate specifications and service screens written in various languages including English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and Korean.
  2. One-Click Translation: To save you from the tedious process of copying and pasting text, we have implemented a feature that allows users to directly select the area within Figma for one-click translation.
  3. Replace Mode: The plugin is equipped with the ability to translate while retaining the existing Figma text format into the desired multilingual language. If you wish, you can simultaneously view the input and output languages without overwriting.

plugins.name: Xerus
plugins.description:
Xerus helps you to organize the texts of your designs while having powerful tools to automate your text workflow. It synchronizes your figma text and your Airtable database.


Xerus is for free! I am glad I can contribute to the community. Airtable has a free version too, that supports a maximum of text entries, please check their price plan to see which option is best for you.


Getting started

There are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.


Features

  • Text synchronization between Airtable database and Figma.
  • Multiple layer synchronization pointing to the same database entry.
  • Single layer synchronization.
  • Multiple database connections


Incoming features

Do you have suggestions to improve Xerus? Contact me!

  • Import/Export of PO files.
  • Support complex Airtable fields


Updates

  • 1.0: first release
  • 2.0: fixed bug with airtable token and improved the error messaging.
  • 3.0: added support texts with breaklines
plugins.tagline: Xerus allows you to manage large amount of texts in your designs.

plugins.name: Component Utility
plugins.description:
Component Utility

A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

Demo: https://youtu.be/j6dRKs2V8dQ


Clone Command

Clones the master component and links the selected instances to it.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked to new master component, along with the master component to be cloned.
  2. Run the clone command.
  3. A new master component would have been created and all the selected instances are linked to it.


Link Command

Links the selected instances to the designated master component. It can also links detached instances (or a frame containing similar child elements as the master component) and the designated master component.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked, along with the master component to which they should be linked to.
  2. Run the link command.
plugins.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

plugins.name: FlowConnect - Figjam Connectors in Figma
plugins.description:
FlowConnect: Connectors that are smart and seamless


FlowConnect brings Figjam-style connectors to Figma, making it easy to link frames and create flows. With smart positioning that automatically adjusts when you move elements, customizable arrow styles, and simple text labels, you can quickly create clean user flows and sitemaps. Connect your frames with just a few clicks and let FlowConnect handle the rest.


Key Features :


✦ Figjam-style connectors: Create connections between frames with real-time visual feedback

✦ Smart positioning: Connectors find the best connection points and auto-reroute when frames move

✦ Advanced styling options: Customize line types, stroke weights, dash patterns, and opacity

✦ Text labels: Add descriptive text to your connections that update automatically

✦ Live preview: See how your connections will look before you create them

✦ Multiple arrow styles: Choose from lines, triangles, diamonds, and circles for both connector ends

✦ Offset controls: Fine-tune connection points for perfect placement along frame edges


Premium Features :


✦ Custom Color Connectors

✦ Shapes - Future

✦ Set Presets

✦ More on the Roadmap.


How to use :

  1. Connecter is Pre copied already, You can just Ctrl/Cmd + V in you canvas to get started, If no press the copy button on top and paste them in canvas [One time Thing].
  2. Select any two objects and click Link objects to connect them using a connector styled according to your preferences.
plugins.tagline: Connectors that are smart and seamless

plugins.name: IMG color extractor
plugins.description:
🎨 IMG Color Extractor

IMG Color Extractor es una herramienta diseñada para obtener la paleta de colores a partir de cualquier imagen. Mapea e identifica el color dominante y los secundarios según su presencia en la imagen.

Ya sea que estés creando un sistema de diseño, buscando inspiración para un nuevo proyecto o documentando colores, IMG Color Extractor simplifica tu trabajo, permitiéndote ahorrar tiempo y enfocarte en lo que realmente importa: la creatividad. ✨


Características Principales

  1. 🌈 Extracción de Colores Precisa: Carga cualquier imagen (incluso formatos como WebP o SVG) y obtén el color dominante junto con una paleta secundaria, generada con la tecnología de Color Thief.
  2. 📋 Copia Rápida al Portapapeles: Haz clic en cualquier bloque de color y copia su valor hexadecimal para usarlo directamente en tu diseño.
  3. 🖌️ Creación de Estilos Agrupados: Envía la paleta generada a la librería de estilos de Figma con un solo clic, agrupando los colores bajo el nombre "IMGColorExtrator".


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Carga tu Imagen: Haz clic en "Seleccionar imagen" y carga cualquier imagen desde tu dispositivo.
  2. Visualiza la Paleta: La herramienta identifica el color dominante y los colores secundarios, mostrándolos como bloques interactivos para que puedas analizarlos fácilmente.
  3. Copia los Colores o Exporta a Figma: Haz clic en cualquier bloque de color para copiar su valor hexadecimal al portapapeles. Presiona el botón "Enviar a mis estilos" para exportar la paleta a la librería de estilos en Figma, lista para ser reutilizada en tus proyectos.


Mejoras? Claro que si! déjame tus comentarios y recomendaciones. 🚀
plugins.tagline: Extrae la paleta de colores dominante y secundaria de cualquier imagen

plugins.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
plugins.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀


Pro tip: Set a max height on text layers to enforce truncation. ✂️


Features


Full creative freedom

Use your brand fonts, colors and more to create high-fidelity dynamic images ✨


Fast rendering

Our backend is optimized to generate and distribute your images without long wait times. Often images are generated in as little as 200ms.


Handoff your templates to developers

Each template your create comes with it's own documentation and playground environment, making it trivial for your engineering team to make use of the image rendering API.


Contact


If you want to share your feedback, please reach out to us at support@dynogee.com.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

plugins.name: Pulpo
plugins.description:
Introducing the Pulpo Plugin for Figma, a powerful tool that seamlessly integrates your Figma files with Pulpo, providing you with a centralized platform to manage all your Figma comments.


With the Pulpo Plugin, you can effortlessly sync multiple Figma files, consolidating all the comments from each file into a single, unified space.


Gone are the days of juggling between different Figma projects to keep track of discussions and feedback. This plugin offers a streamlined workflow, allowing you to visualize and organize all your Figma comments in one convenient location. By bringing together comments from multiple files, you gain a comprehensive overview of the feedback received across your design projects.

Through its intuitive interface, the Pulpo Plugin empowers you to efficiently navigate through your comments, providing seamless access to the context and details of each conversation. You can easily respond to comments, resolve issues, or collaborate with your team members directly from within Pulpo.


With Pulpo's advanced features, you can also assign comments to specific team members, set due dates, and track the progress of discussions, ensuring that all feedback is addressed and actioned upon in a timely manner.


The Pulpo Plugin not only enhances your team's collaboration but also improves your overall design workflow. By centralizing your Figma comments, you can eliminate the need for constant switching between projects, saving you valuable time and effort.


Experience a new level of efficiency and organization with the Pulpo Plugin for Figma. Streamline your comment management process and unlock the full potential of your design collaboration.


For more info visit https://usepulpo.com/
plugins.tagline: All your Figma files comments in one place

plugins.name: Numeric Tokens Generator
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with a comprehensive design system generator that creates and manages typography, spacing, border radius, and shadow systems - all powered by Figma variables.


Key Features:

📝 Complete Typography System

  1. Generate responsive typography scales with Material Design or Apple HIG guidelines
  2. Smart font pairing validation for optimal readability
  3. Automatic variable creation for font sizes and line heights
  4. Support for custom type scales and base sizes
  5. Responsive typography with desktop, tablet, and mobile variants (Pro)


↔️ Spacing System

  1. Create consistent spacing scales based on 4px or 8px grids
  2. Generate spacing variables for margins, padding, and layout
  3. Customizable number of spacing increments
  4. Visual preview of spacing values


⚪ Border Radius System

  1. Build systematic border radius scales
  2. Customizable base radius and increments
  3. Visual preview of radius values
  4. Perfect for maintaining consistent component shapes


🎭 Shadow System

  1. Create elevation-based shadow systems
  2. Customizable shadow properties (color, blur, spread)
  3. Visual angle control for consistent light sources
  4. Perfect for depth and hierarchy


📤 Export Options

  1. Web: CSS, SCSS, JSON
  2. Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Android XML, Swift
  3. Variables-first approach for easy updates
  4. Cross-platform consistency


📚 Auto-Documentation

  1. Generate visual documentation for your design system
  2. Automatic style guides with examples
  3. Clear naming conventions
  4. Easy team handoff


🔄 Smart Updates

  1. Detect existing settings
  2. Update system-wide changes through variables
  3. Maintain consistency across your design files


Perfect for design system creators, UI designers, and teams looking to maintain consistent, scalable design systems across web and mobile platforms.

plugins.name: Caravage
plugins.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

Caravage allows you to check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


You can either select individually any text layer or scan a selection and the plugin will automatically give you for each text:

  1. The colour(s) of the text.
  2. The colour(s) of the background directly behind the text.
  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
plugins.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

plugins.name: VibeGen — Generate AI Images and Capture a Vibe
plugins.description:
Bring your ideas to life — faster.


VibeGen lets you capture the *vibe* of any reference image and use it to generate something completely new, right inside Figma. Upload a reference, enter a prompt, and remix your inspiration into fresh icons, mockups, graphics, and more.


✨ Features:

  1. Upload a reference image to instantly capture its style.
  2. Generate fresh designs based on your reference's look and feel.
  3. Edit or remix prompts to explore variations.
  4. Create icons, product mockups, social graphics, and UI elements.
  5. Automatically remove backgrounds for clean assets.
  6. Designed for speed — built directly into Figma.


🎨 What you can create:

  1. Custom icons with unique styles.
  2. Fresh product mockups for marketing and UI.
  3. New takes on your own sketches, wireframes, or screenshots.
  4. Graphics that match a specific aesthetic or trend.
  5. Edited images with removed backgrounds for clean use.


🚀 Why VibeGen?

  1. Save time by starting from inspiration, not a blank canvas.
  2. Easily match styles across projects and presentations.
  3. Turn rough ideas into polished, professional visuals.
  4. Explore new creative directions without leaving Figma.


➡️ Ready to vibe?

Upload a reference image, prompt your vision, and let VibeGen handle the rest.
